title: 2-Million-Year-Old Fossil May Be The Oldest Example of an Early Human
Dinosaur National Monument makes first fossil discovery since 1924 — under its parking lot
description: A recent construction project at Dinosaur National Monument revealed a lot more than old asphalt. Here's what crews found.

title: In ancient Arabia, people dined on sharks and stingrays
description: ‘We know that these were not just ordinary proteins, but proteins from the top of the food chain.’The post In ancient Arabia, people dined on sharks and stingrays appeared first on Popular Science.

title: Ancient mummified cheetahs discovered in Saudi Arabia contain preserved DNA from the long-lost population
description: Cheetahs vanished from Saudi Arabia half a century ago. Now long-dead mummified big cats may help herald their return.
